# UIWebView.PaginationMode.rightToLeft

**Case**

Content is broken up into pages that flow from right to left.

## Declaration

```swift
case rightToLeft
```

## Constants

- **UIWebView.PaginationMode.unpaginated**: Content appears as one long scrolling view with no distinct pages.
- **UIWebView.PaginationMode.leftToRight**: Content is broken up into pages that flow from left to right.
- **UIWebView.PaginationMode.topToBottom**: Content is broken up into pages that flow from top to bottom.
- **UIWebView.PaginationMode.bottomToTop**: Content is broken up into pages that flow from bottom to top.
